ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Demonstrates how to use the ILabelProvider interface to customize axis labels individually
ExampleDefinition.Description:
Demonstrates how to use the [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/webframe.html#Axis%20Labels%20-%20LabelProvider%20API.html']LabelProvider API[/url] to customize axis labels individually. Using this API you can override individual labels for all types of axes. By default SciChart defines the following label providers:
- DateTimeLabelProvider - NumericLabelProvider - TimeSpanLabelProvider - TradeChartAxisLabelProvider
If you create a LabelProvider, inherit from the correct class above or [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/webframe.html#SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.Visuals.Axes.LabelProviders.LabelProviderBase.html']LabelProviderBase[/url] to get even more customization options.
